definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of war-chariot Is 5:28, Je 47:3, also coll. Ez Eze 23:24, Eze 26:10; perh. also in Ezekiel's vision Ez Eze 10:2, Eze 10:6, Eze 10:13 (cf. wheelwork) but cf. infr.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: whirl (of dust or chaff) Ps 83:14, Is 17:13, sim. of foes put to flight by God.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: perh. whirling of wheels Ez Eze 10:2, Eze 10:6, Eze 10:13 Sm RV, but cf. supr.
